value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column.
